context.p: DITA documents are published with DITA Open Toolkit V1.4 that requires installation of Java not older than J2SE v 1.4.2_08. For instructions, see and .
DITA documents can be published to HTML and PDF format. Publishing to PDF can be done either with FOP out-of-the-box or with Antenna House XSL Formatter.
To publish a document, do the following:

info.p: In the Publish Dialog, select the publishing output from the Publishing output drop-down list.

choice.p: To publish PDF with FOP, select PDF.
To publish PDF with Antenna House XSL Formatter, select PDF(with AH).

note.p: For more information about publishing DITA documents to PDF with Antenna House XSL Formatter, see .

step.cmd: Specify the output filename and location.

info.p: In the Write to field, you can specify the output filename. You can use the Browse button to specify the output file location.
When the script ends, click the View button to view the published document.
